channel.title: Manufacturing on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Manufacturing on Home

item.title: Welding
item.description: We are dedicated to delivering welding and inspection processes that adhere to the stringent standards of ISO 3834-2. Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our use of advanced techniques, including MIG (131), MAG (135), and TIG (141). From concept to creation, our metal fabrication services cover a wide spectrum, including structural steel, aluminium, and stainless steel fabrication. We understand that each project is unique. That’s why International Welding Engineer (IWE) is an integral part of our team.

item.title: Welding automation
item.description: We developed device for welding long welds. The device is mainly designed for welding long welds of fillet welds and butt welds by methods MIG or MAG. Advantages of this device is simultaneous welding from two sides. Its main components consist of a support frame with a longitudinal positioning table for workpieces and a horizontal linear track with a traversing carriage. This track includes a carriage drive, wire feeders, welding torches, technological torches with vertical and horizontal correction supports, welding torch holders, and a control unit.

item.title: Press brake and roll bending
item.description: Safan E-Brake B 100-3100 The E-Brake incorporates all the benefits of the proven servo-electric drive concept. The transfer of pressing force relies on a mechanism with flat belts and a set of rotating wheels on roller bearings. Thanks to incomparably higher acceleration and deceleration of the ram, it achieves greater productivity compared to hydraulic presses. Parameters Value Maximum bending force 1 000 kN Maximum working length 3 100 mm BENDMAK | CY SERIES 3-ROLL Intial pinch plate rolls The Bendmak CY Series 3 Roll Initial Pinch style of plate rolls are the most popular style for thinner material requirements.

item.title: Machining
item.description: In the context of our manufacturing operations a milling machine and a lathe offer support. These tools empower us to adapt flexibly to the requirements of our primary welding production. Milling machine Microcut VMCA 1000 CNC Parameters Value Traverses: X: 1 000 mm, Y: 500 mm, Z: 500 mm Table: 1520 x 520 mm Spindle speed: 10 000 rpm Turning machine SA 48/1000 CNC Parameters Value Max. swing diameter, without bed bridge: 710 mm Swing diameter over bed: 475 mm Max.
